properties.name: Milford Sound
properties.description: New Zealand's most famous fiord carved by glaciers with steep cliffs, waterfalls, and marine life

properties.name: Aoraki/Mount Cook
properties.description: New Zealand's tallest mountain at 3,724m with glaciers and alpine scenery

properties.name: Tongariro Alpine Crossing
properties.description: 19.4km volcanic traverse past emerald lakes, old lava flows, and volcanic peaks (UNESCO)

properties.name: Franz Josef Glacier
properties.description: Spectacular 12km glacier descending from the Southern Alps nearly to sea level

properties.name: Fox Glacier
properties.description: Fed by four alpine glaciers, longer and faster-moving than Franz Josef with stunning walks

properties.name: Lake Tekapo
properties.description: Surreal turquoise lake with International Dark Sky Reserve status and mountain views

properties.name: Lake Wanaka
properties.description: Stunning lake surrounded by snow-capped mountains, gateway to Mount Aspiring

properties.name: Abel Tasman National Park
properties.description: Golden beaches, clear waters, and one of New Zealand's best coastal walks

properties.name: Cathedral Cove
properties.description: Natural rock archway framing a pristine beach on the Coromandel Peninsula

properties.name: Rotorua Geothermal Area
properties.description: Volcanic plateau of hot springs, mud pools, geysers, and crater lakes

properties.name: Roy's Peak
properties.description: Most photographed viewpoint in NZ, 1578m above Lake Wanaka with Southern Alps panorama

properties.name: Cape Reinga
properties.description: Sacred northernmost tip where Tasman Sea and Pacific Ocean collide with iconic lighthouse

properties.name: Bob's Peak (Queenstown)
properties.description: Gondola access to jaw-dropping views over Queenstown, Lake Wakatipu, and the Remarkables

properties.name: Nugget Point
properties.description: Lighthouse lookout with bird's-eye views of rocky islets with seals and sea lions in The Catlins

properties.name: Slope Point
properties.description: True southernmost point of the South Island mainland with wind-sculpted trees

properties.name: Waitomo Caves
properties.description: Famous glowworm caves with bioluminescent larvae like stars

properties.name: Doubtful Sound
properties.description: Larger and more remote than Milford Sound, UNESCO fiord

properties.name: Hobbiton Movie Set
properties.description: Preserved Lord of the Rings film location with 44 Hobbit holes

properties.name: Wai-O-Tapu Thermal Wonderland
properties.description: Most colorful geothermal area with Champagne Pool

properties.name: Punakaiki Pancake Rocks
properties.description: Layered limestone formations with dramatic blowholes

properties.name: Mount Taranaki
properties.description: Symmetrical 2,518m volcanic cone, sacred to Maori
